Source.Name: perl-HTTP-Body
Source.Description: HTTP::Body, HTTP POST verisini çözümler ve application/octet-stream, application/x-www-form-urlencoded, ile multipart/form-data verilerini destekler.
HTTP::Body parses chunks of HTTP POST data and supports application/octet-stream, application/x-www-form-urlencoded, and multipart/form-data.
